lines.text: The English liner, Gigantic, docks at Southampton with a summer cargo of sight-seeing Yankees.
Samuel G. Adams, the scrub-brush-king. He hates publicity like a bird hates wings.
I must toddle along. My uncle, Dr. Paul Scott, left for Liverpool without his traveling bag and wants it rushed on.
All right, doctor, you may examine me here.
My heart feels bumpy - please listen to it.
What must the butler think of me!
Lunchtime becomes dinner-time. Dinner-time becomes bed-time, and the "newly-weds" slip from the frying pan into the fire.
